Class: BooleanParameter

BooleanParameter(optionsopt)

new BooleanParameter(optionsopt)

A parameter that specifies a true or false value.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
options Object <optional>

Object with the following properties:

Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
terria Terria

The Terria instance.
id String

The unique ID of this parameter.
name String <optional>

The name of this parameter. If not specified, the ID is used as the name.
description String <optional>

The description of the parameter.
trueName String <optional>

The name for the "true" value of the boolean parameter.
trueDescription String <optional>

The description for the "true" value of the boolean parameter.
falseName String <optional>

The name for the "false" value of the boolean parameter.
falseDescription String <optional>

The description for the "false" value of the boolean parameter.
defaultValue Boolean <optional>
 false

The default value.
